question_text:
Choose the correct answer 

Statements:

All Gold are Platinum.

No Platinum is Silver.

Some Diamonds are Silver.



Conclusion:

I. Some Diamonds are Gold.

II. Some Diamonds are Platinum.

III. Some Gold are Silver.

IV. No Silver is Gold.



Choices:

1- Only I follows

2- Only III follows

3- Only IV follows

4- Only II and IV follow
